title: Ticket #6829: Test (Python) JobEvent class

Test will be broken until TJ gets the log reader whitespace fix in.

[55823] is in, and revealed a bug, which has been fixed. This ticket is done. It requires neither review (being all changes to the test suite) nor documentation (the same).
